q1: Were you impressed by the Swiss team's performance in the 2018 world cup?
a1: It could have been worse but it was a bit forgettable.
q3: How does Switzerland compare to Germany?
a3: As far as soccer goes, they are both tactical teams. The Germans seem to have more precision in passing and completing plays however
q4: I do agree. They have good counter attacks though.
a4: Both teams are great in my opinion. Germany may be a little better though.
